descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the Elucidator and the Dark Repulser from Sword Art Online to Skyrim. These are Kirito's swords which he uses with his "Dual Blades" skill.
Enjoy!

NOTE: This mod does not add Kirito's outfit!!
You can find that mod here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=271072602

To acquire the sword you have to craft it under the Ebony section.

[b][u]Dual Sheath Redux Compatibility[/u][/b]
This mod is now out of the box compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url].
Take note, only the nexus version is. The Steam version is [u]not[/u] compatible!

Thanks ArmedKevin117 for doing that with the previous version!

Tips and well placed critique are welcome!
Big thanks to Shoba/LeckerHamster !
author: Mr Flopsie
